page.title: 09St JOHN'S CADETS.
page.content: My name is Susan Robinson and I am a member of the St John's Ambulance Cadets.We meet every Monday night at 6.00p.m.in the Langwith Colliery Institute,which used to be the colliery canteen before the mine closed in 1979.Miss McKenzie and Mrs Scott instruct the 26 members in all aspects of first aid.We are taught how to treat wounds and fractures,the bones of the body and mouth to mouth resusitation.The cadets also have to learn the drill for when they are parading at Galas,competitions and at the Rememberance Sunday Service.All members over 11 years of age are eligible to attend the annual camp at Skegness,which is really a holiday with cadets from all over the country.The camp is ended with a huge parade round the site,with banners waving to the sound of the band.
